name: Fun Temple Runing Crazy Guy
description:
Play as various characters and outrun the shrieking flying baboons as you turn, jump and slide your way across the land. Begin your exhilarating adventure now and see how far you can run!

Game Features:-

-Excellent HD graphics
-Upgrade new characters
-Unlock new power ups
-Exciting and Fun PLAY!


How to Play:-

*Swipe your fingers to move left and right.
*Swipe your finger to jump.
